author: Tom Metcalfe, Linda Givetash
title: At the extremes of the earth, scientists stymied by coronavirus concerns
description: Most experts anticipate that coronavirus precautions could be necessary for many months, and many scientists also expect that their work could be disrupted.
content:
The McMurdo Station in Antarctica on Oct. 13, 2016.DigitalGlobe / via Getty Images
Winter is coming to Antarctica. The sun rises for only a few hours each day at McMurdo Station, and the last support aircraft are heading home, leaving the base to a small "wi… [+6485 chars]
